bill_title: require certain recipients of  child support payments to make an annual expenditure report of those payments.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to require certain recipients of child support payments to make an annual expenditure report of those payments. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 25-7A be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Any person, who under an order for support receives monetary support for any dependent child, shall, by April fifteenth of each year, file with the Department of Social Services a report accounting for all expenditures of that monetary support in the previous calendar year. The Department of Social Services shall, by rules promulgated pursuant to chapter 1-26, establish the form of the report and specify the information to contained in the report. 350 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.027 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
